DOC.brief_summary: In this non-interventional multicentre, prospective, observational cohort study, the efficacy of desmopressin is evaluated in patients with platelet dysfunction due to acetylsalicylic acid or cox-1-inhibitors within the context of surgical procedures.
DOC.brief_title: Documentation of the Efficacy of Desmopressin Within the Context of Surgical Procedures
DOC.criteria: Pre, peri or postoperative treatment with a standard dose of desmopressin as a result of platelet dysfunction (disturbance of blood platelet function) due to treatment with acetylsalicylic acid or cox1inhibitor.
